body_html:
I should have provided more context: I had a chat with @ezyang and we talked about also getting rid of parse_nn.py in aten/src/ATen. This is where a cwrap declaration file for nn functions came about.

I was wondering if we could further simplify things by migrating to yaml proper for all declaration files. In any case let me know if I should stop here and leave parse_nn.py in place.

Branch is here, just for reference: https://github.com/lantiga/pytorch/tree/no_autogen

body:
I should have provided more context: I had a chat with @ezyang and we talked about also getting rid of parse_nn.py in aten/src/ATen. This is where a cwrap declaration file for nn functions came about.

I was wondering if we could further simplify things by migrating to yaml proper for all declaration files. In any case let me know if I should stop here and leave parse_nn.py in place.

Branch is here, just for reference: https://github.com/lantiga/pytorch/tree/no_autogen
